article.title: Oracle Offers Data Warehousing Webinar
article.author: Maryann Lawlor, SIGNAL Connections
article.abstract: In addition to white papers and research material, the Resource Library is the repository for archived webinars, so site visitors can view them when and where they’d like.
article.text: In addition to white papers and research material, the Resource Library is the repository for archived webinars, so site visitors can view them when and where they’d like. Oracle Exadata for Data WarehousingSponsored by DLT SolutionsThe Oracle Exadata Database Machine enables agencies to reduce information technology costs through consolidation, so they can manage more data on multiple compression tiers and improve performance of all applications.Join Rick Greenwald, director of Oracle partner enablement, as he provides a detailed look at the features of the Exadata Database platform, including hardware, predefined configurations and a number of software features that can deliver enhanced performance for data warehouse workloads.
